dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Welcome! Today, another hero will be born. One who will help decide the world's fate... What's your name, hero?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Are you a boy, or a girl?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: What's your occupation?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: And what do you look like?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: I shall now predict your journey using your past, present, and future. Beginning with your past, what sort of circumstances were you born into?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: And what about you now? What is your most impressive attribute?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: Finally, your future. What kind of future trait do you strive to attain?

dialogue.speaker: Anna
dialogue.line: With everything now complete, let us begin your story posthaste...

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: Eek!

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: Hey, are you okay?

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: I-I'm sorry. I was in a hurry, and... Excuse me, did you come here to become an Altean knight as well?

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: Yeah. I came here all the way from Sera village when I heard they were recruiting new knights. My name's Kris.

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: Kris? That's a nice name. We're here for the same reason then. My name is Katarina. I came because I wish to serve Prince Marth. But there sure are a lot of hopefuls here. Look, there's one over there and another there...

dialogue.speaker: Luke
dialogue.line: Here it is! This is where my shining legacy starts! The first chapter of my epic saga to become Altea's greatest knight!

dialogue.speaker: Roderick
dialogue.line: ...Luke, I'm going up ahead.

dialogue.speaker: Luke
dialogue.line: Hey, wait up, Roderick! Don't leave your partner behind!

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: There's no doubt those two were knight candidates like us.

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: We should follow them, Kris. I think the leader of the knights, Sir Jagen, has something to say to all of us.

dialogue.speaker: Jagen
dialogue.line: Altea's gates have opened today so that we may test you as potential knights. Knights will be chosen by their ability, not by their blood. The path is not easy, however. We have gathered a hundred men and women today, and only a handful of you will succeed.

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: T-this is nerve-wracking.

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: I'm nervous too, but I've been training hard for this day.

dialogue.speaker: Jagen
dialogue.line: We expect every one of you to show us the results of your arduous training! Apprentices, I want you to gather in pairs! You will be facing real Altean knights in mock combat!

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: Huh?! We have to fight? T-this could be a problem... Kris, would you please partner with me? I'm training to become a tactician.

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: A tactician?

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: Y-yes. I can give you advice on how to fight, but I can't fight at all...

dialogue.speaker: Soldier
dialogue.line: Hey, you two! You're up next. Grab your weapons and get into position. Hurry!

dialogue.speaker: Kris
dialogue.line: Got it! Let's go, Katarina! The test is about to start.

dialogue.speaker: Katarina
dialogue.line: Y-yes! Let's do our best.

battle.speaker: Katarina
battle.line: Kris! Let's move to that spot over there.

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: So you made it to the right place. I'll be your first opponent. Attack me whenever you like!

battle.speaker: Jagen
battle.line: ...I'm your final opponent for the day. Don't hold back!

boss.speaker: Jagen
boss.line: Excellent. Show me what you've got!

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Yes... splendid work! I see we can expect much from this year's apprentices.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: You did it! We won, Kris! ...But I didn't really do anything... It was all thanks to you that we won, Kris!

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Prince Marth wishes to address everyone who passed the test. Sire, if you please.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I humbly thank you all for coming.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Ah, it's Prince Marth! He looks so majestic. So that's the face of the hero who saved the world. I love the stories about Prince Marth in the last war. How about you, Kris?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Of course. After all, Prince Marth was the hero who brought an end to the previous war.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Yes, he defeated the Shadow Dragon and Dark Pontifex, restoring peace to the world.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: You there, silence! You stand before Prince Marth!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Everyone. I'm truly happy that so many came to help shoulder Altea's future. With the war over, peace has returned. However, peace isn't something we can simply take for granted: It is my duty, as ruler, to risk my life to protect it. Alone, I am powerless. So, everyone. From now on, I want you to lend me your power, as my knights.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Hear hear, Prince Marth! It was wonderful hearing Prince Marth speak, wasn't it, Kris?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes, it was. We have to do our best so he can rely on us.
